title: Ola Electric forms new service team amid rising customer complaints
description: Ola Electric has established a new service team to address the increasing number of customer complaints regarding service issues. The company receives around 80,000 complaints monthly, leading to long wait times and customer dissatisfaction. Shares of Ola Electric Mobility Ltd surged 10% following the announcement.
